Name: VR 뉴욕 스토리
About the game: We have updated VR New York Story from 60 units to 120 units! You can enjoy much more variety of contents for the same price! Are you hesitating to go study abroad because you have a tight budget? →Experience studying in America virtually only for $59.99! You will learn how to speak 3800 different expressions in English as well as enjoying on-the-spot experiences in 50 different locations in New York. Are you still hanging out with friends who speak the same language, while studying overseas? →Communicate with 32 different foreign 3D characters like Sam and Barbara and become real friends! Are you too nervous to speak when you bump into foreigners, worrying that you will make a mistake? →Don’t be afraid! Practice and enjoy daily life conversations with various characters and gain confidence! Are you stuck at home wanting to travel to New York? (I do!) →You only need a VR headset and once you make a one-time purchase of VR New York Story, we're all set. Off to New York! Are you looking for jobs abroad but worried about what to say during your interview or in real life business situations? →VR New York Story will get you ready for all sorts of circumstances that could happen when you live abroad, with currently 120 episodes and more on the way! Main Episodes ⊙Go through immigration with Sam, the immigration officer. ⊙Order a steak at a restaurant with a new friend, Mark ⊙Request to open a bank account to bank teller, Anthony ⊙Go clubbing with your roommate, Jimmy ⊙Reschedule a study session with your classmate, Wolfgang ⊙Take a book out from the librarian, Bill ⊙Talk about a task deadline with your boss, Jenifer Dive right into VR New York Story to check-out more episodes including traveling, daily life, life at work, having a relationship and more! Key Features ⊙Communicate with 32 different 3D characters using 'Voice Recognition' technology! ⊙Feel as if you were in New York with an artificially built, but a realistic-looking environment based on 'high quality VR technology'! ⊙Interact actively with characters through an Emotion meter that shows you how the characters feel about this conversation! ⊙Check for correct pronunciation, intonation, grammar, and fluency in total through our evaluation system! ⊙Learn background knowledge as well as English speaking with this well-organized challenge system!
